name: VR Alien Zone
description:
Alien Zone: Alien Shooter
Let have fun with Google Cardboard Virtual Reality

Your mission is simple – kill all the alien monster that try to kill you.
- Enjoy user friendly control schemes with auto-reload option available!
- stand up to the huge crowds of monsters appearing on the screen.
- Survive the level
- Enjoy killer the monster that try to attack you
- Unlimited "Survive" mode - try to improve your shooter skills!
